section.title: Event Modelling Systems
section.para: The various concepts associated with application of event models will be presented in this section. Included will be specific details of the assumptions inherent in the application, namely the need for parameters that ensure frequency transformation with single burst simulation and the need for frequency analysis of predictions from the Monte-Carlo simulation. Detailed in the second and third sections will be specific details necessary for application of the relevant methods, and the advantages and disadvantages of both approaches.
